name: A Gift For Akyuu
description:
A Gift For Akyuu is a (very) short single-stage shoot-em-up in the vein of the main series Touhou games.

Story
-----------
There's a specific book that Hieda no Akyuu has been looking for to help with her research. Kosuzu Motoori, her loving girlfriend, decides she's going to find it for her.
Unfortunately for her, the only place that could have such a rare book is the massive library of the infamous Scarlet Devil Mansion.
Having learned to fly and fight recently, Kosuzu sets out to find this book in the name of love.

Credits
-----------
Title/Ending Art, Character Portraits: Praeto

In-Game Graphics, Design, Programming, Music: Keeg F.

Touhou Project and included characters/setting/music: ZUN

Made With Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Special Thanks to the Gamedev Discord

Happy Pride 2020!
